publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-639# Alex Neil: Scottish Widows and Lloyds TSB—That the Parliament deplores the decision to transfer Scottish Widows jobs out of Scotland and believes that none of Lloyds TSB’s operations in Scotland should be threatened with either closure or downsizing as a consequence of work being transferred abroad.

S2M-639# Alex Neil: Scottish Widows and Lloyds TSB-That the Parliament deplores the decision to transfer Scottish Widows' jobs out of Scotland and believes that none of Lloyds TSB's operations in Scotland should be threatened with either closure or downsizing as a consequence of work being transferred abroad. Supported by: Margo MacDonald*
S2M-639# Scottish Widows and Lloyds TSB (lodged on 20 November 2003) Ms Sandra White*, Donald Gorrie*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-639# Scottish Widows and Lloyds TSB (lodged on 20 November 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*, Michael Matheson*, Robert Brown*
S2M-639# Scottish Widows and Lloyds TSB (lodged on 20 November 2003) Elaine Smith*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-639# Scottish Widows and Lloyds TSB (lodged on 20 November 2003) Brian Adam*
